lead_paragraph: World number one Novak Djokovic has apologizes for his comments suggesting tennis's top men should get paid more than women after he drew criticism from current and former players.
snippet: World number one Novak Djokovic has apologizes for his comments suggesting tennis's top men should get paid more than women after he drew criticism from current and former players....

headline.main: Djokovic Apologizes for Comments on Gender Pay
headline.print_headline: Djokovic Apologizes for Comments on Gender Pay
